definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)

sentences.english: The research could lead to new therapies for preventing cancer metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究將會引發癌轉移的新療法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the changes of apoptosis during the genesis and development of laryngeal squamous cell carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討細胞凋亡在喉鱗狀細胞癌發生發展中的變化。

sentences.english: Objective To study the nursing points of using semiconductor laser to cure early glottis cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討半導體激光手術治療早期聲門癌的護理要點。

sentences.english: The optimal postoperative treatment for patients with resectable pancreatic cancer has not yet been determined.
sentences.chinese: 接受切除胰臟癌患者最佳的術後治療，目前仍未確定。

sentences.english: Methods The transplant tumor model of H22 hepatocarcinoma in mice was established.
sentences.chinese: 方法建立移植瘤小鼠H22肝細胞癌模型。

sentences.english: Oat bran was porphyrizd into cell-level ultramicro-power.
sentences.chinese: 正沿支氣管蔓延的燕麥細胞癌。

sentences.english: In this paper we reviewed the recent progress in proteomic study of hepatocellular carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 本文就肝細胞癌的蛋白質組學研究進展作簡要綜述。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnostic value of spiral CT in pancreas ampulla carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討壺腹部癌的螺旋CT診斷價值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the suitable diagnostic methods for urothelial cancers.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討上尿路上皮癌合適的診斷方法。

sentences.english: The differential diagnosis includes squamous cell carcinoma, verrucous carcinoma and condyloma acuminatum.
sentences.chinese: 鑑別診斷包括鱗狀細胞癌，疣狀癌以及尖銳溼疣。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT Choriocarcinoma is one of solid tumors which are sensitive to chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 絨毛膜癌是一種對化療敏感的實體腫瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To study clinicopathological characteristics of primary esophageal small cell carcinoma(PESC).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討食管小細胞癌的臨牀病理特點。

sentences.english: The histologic classification of breast carcinoma into duct and lobular type lacks the basis of histogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌分類爲導管癌和小葉癌缺少組織發生學依據。

sentences.english: The histologic classification of breast carcinoma into duct and lobular type lacks the basis of histogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌分類爲導管癌和小葉癌缺少組織發生學依據。

sentences.english: The depth of cance invasion was related to the area of the cancer.
sentences.chinese: 癌竈面積大小對於癌竈浸潤深度的判斷有一定意義。

sentences.english: The depth of cance invasion was related to the area of the cancer.
sentences.chinese: 癌竈面積大小對於癌竈浸潤深度的判斷有一定意義。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
